program.name: Goodgame Empire - Non Incentivized
program.description: <p><b>Browser game</b><br></p><p>Become the lord of a castle and turn your small fortress into the capital of the entire kingdom in this exciting online strategy game. Establish an efficient economic system and assemble a mighty army to defend your realm and extend your territory. Forge alliances with other players worldwide to crush your enemies, and become the sole ruler of a mighty empire!</p><p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Target group</span>: male, between 13 - 35 years</p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Flow:</span> Single Optin: can create avatar but dont have to, fill in username, email address, password, accept T&amp;Cs<br><br><br><span style="font-weight:bold;"></span>

program.name: Drakensang - Int'l - Non Incent
program.description: <span style="font-weight:bold;">Browsergame<br><br></span>DrakensangOnline is the first browser-based action online RPG in the famous Drakensang saga that stands above the rest thanks to its visually-stunning graphics and detailed game world. In the struggle to save humanity from the dark forces of the Ander world, players are challenged to master numerous quests and test their mettle against fierce competition in different arenas.<br><br><span style="font-weight:bold;">Target: </span>Gaming Channel, Males in the 18-55 demo<br><br><span style="font-weight:bold;">Flow:</span> Single Optin, enter username, password, email address, enter captcha Code<br>

program.name: Yur Mobile Hungary
program.description: <p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Yur Mobile is operated by a team of&nbsp;<b>highly skilled professionals</b>&nbsp;who know how to&nbsp;<b>convert users</b>&nbsp;and<b>maximize your profits</b>.</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media &amp; entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.</span></p><p><b><span style="font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</span></b></p><p><b><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Affiliate Benefits:</span></b><span style="font-family:Calibri;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content.&nbsp;Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><b><span style="font-family:Calibri;">User Flow:</span></b><span style="font-family:Calibri;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Affiliates benefit from our simple order process.&nbsp;User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by Pincode or SMS. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><b><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Typical Demographics:</span></b><span style="font-family:Calibri;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.</span></p><p><span style="font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</span></p>
program.countries: HU

program.name: Yur Mobile Hungary - Mobile Web
program.restrictions: HU traffic only<br><br>Incentivized/VC traffic is NOT allowed<br><br>&nbsp;<br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)&nbsp; Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.<br><br>any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

program.name: 4Story Int'l Non incent
program.description: <b>Download game</b><br>4Story is a diverse fantasy MMORPG (Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game) in which you can show your skills of in exciting battles for castles and regions. <p>Choose your side and charge into sweeping battles for important strongholds with a countless amount of other players. Plunge into a fantastic adventure with your friends and discover many quests and exciting journeys through time all the while learning more of the land's background story. Investigate dungeons full of secrets, defeat dangerous monsters and uncover legendary treasures. The fate of Iberia lies in your hands!</p> <p>4Story is developed by Zemi Interactive Entertainment.</p>

program.name: OGame Int'l Non Incent
program.description: <b>Browser game</b><br>With over 30 million fans worldwide, OGame is one of the most successful browser titles of all time. Set in the vast reaches of outer space, OGame is a multiplayer online real-time strategy game that gives players the chance to research powerful technologies, colonize planets, and amass giant armadas as they mine and trade precious resources.&nbsp;<br><b><br></b><b>No Cost and No Downloads</b>: OGame is browser-based and completely free-to-play. Whether you use a PC or a Mac, all you need is an internet connection to get started on your intergalactic empire.<b><br></b><b><br></b><b>User Flow:</b>Username, email, password, register (Single Opt-In)

program.name: Tribal Wars 2 - Non Incent
program.description: <b><span style="font-size:8.5pt;font-family:Arial, sans-serif;">Browser game</span></b><br><p>The free online strategy game Tribal Wars 2 is set in a medieval universe, filled with knights, generals and political decisions.&nbsp;<br> A medieval Massive Multiplayer Online (MMO) war game with a focus on battle strategy and castle management.</p><p></p>Tribal Wars 2 is the&nbsp;Sequel of strategy-classic “Tribal Wars”<br><span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">User Flow:&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>User must input username, password, valid email, checkbox for terms &amp; conditions, and click play.&nbsp; first page submit SOI</span>.
program.restrictions: <span style="font-weight:bold;">** This program is live under budget, please contact your account manager.</span><span style="font-weight:bold;">Publishers who can send sub_id's, please send via DP.</span><span style="font-weight:bold;"><br></span><span style="font-weight:bold;"><br></span><span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">This program is live under 70 leads per publisher per day for the first month,&nbsp;</span>until quality feedback.<br style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">traffic according to campaign country</span><br style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><br style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">Banners inside facebook Apps may be placed by the Advertising Party if agreed upon in writing by InnoGames. NO AUTOMATIC ENTRY SERVICES – NO TRAFFIC FROM ILLEGAL SITES – (e.g. filesharing, pirate sites, …) NO TRAFFIC FROM INAPPROPRIATE SITES FOR USERS</span>
program.countries: AR, AT, BR, CZ, DK, FI, FR, DE, GR, HU, IT, NL, NO, PL, PT, RO, RU, SK, ES, SE, CH, GB, US

program.name: RealPlayer-INTL-OLFA-Non Incent
program.description: Offer Review:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>Download videos 3X faster from video websites<br>Watch your PC videos on your TV wirelessly<br>Access to all RealPlayer Cloud premium features - $50 value<br>+100GB of personal video cloud storage<br><br>Affiliate Benefits:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.<br><br>User Flow:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>1. User gets to the sign up page.<br>2. User needs to create an account (First name, Last name, Email, Password and accept t&amp;c)<br>3. User needs to enter his payments details.<br>4. User confirms the $1.99 payment for the service.<br>5. The user is subscribed and the conversion occurs.<br><br>Typical Demographics:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>ALL
program.restrictions: OLFA offer - web&amp;mobile traffic from same link.<br>traffic from WW is accepted excluding Russia. <br>GDN/SEM:<br>In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager<br>
